text: Bailey Junior Kurariki (born 15 May 1989) is the youngest convicted killer in New Zealand history, being 12 years old at the time of his conviction. On 12 September 2001, Kurariki and other seven of his friends killed a pizza delivery man named Michael Richard Choy (15 February 1961 - 13 September 2001) in Papakura, a suburb of Auckland. He was convicted of manslaughter. He was released in 2008. In March 2011, Kurariki was again sent to prison for assault and domestic abuse. == References == Category:Living people Category:1989 births Category:People convicted of manslaughter Category:New Zealand people
